column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant | Participants # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=I had always been nervous about flying and had never been on an airplane , so I was very nervous when I realized I had to fly for a business trip a while back .
#text=I did research on the internet and once I felt reasonably comfortable I went on a travel website to look at itineraries .
#text=Once I found the flight times I wanted between the airports I wanted , I input my information into the website and booked the flights .
#text=On the day of flight , I made sure to get to the airport a couple hours early .
#text=I went through security and checked my bags .
#text=I walked down the walkway and onto the plane .
#text=I found my seat and placed my carry on luggage in the overhead compartment .
#text=I sat down and listened to the flight attendant 's obligatory pre-flight instructions .
#text=I fastened my seatbelt and glanced out the window as we went down the runway .
#text=We took off , climbed to cruising altitude , and then the descent came .
#text=We went back to the gate , and departed the plane .
#text=That is how I flew on an airplane .
